overview:
Year of Establishment 2012 Souk Ventures Private Limited, a Delhi based company represents the young entrepreneurial spirit of taking Indian Hand Crafted Master Pieces to the world.

Our Products : Octagonal White Marble Table Top Inlay Work Marble Table Top Round Black Marble Table Top Round White Marble Table Top Marble Table Top Octagonal Marble Table Top Round Green Marble Table Top

Our Quality Assurance: We provide our valuable clients high quality range of products that is manufactured using high grade raw material and advanced technology in our well-developed fabrication unit.

Infrastructure: In order to accomplish our goal of manufacturing, exporting and supplying outstanding quality products, we have always relied on our sound infrastructural base. We have developed a hi-tech division for the production of these products.

Why Us?

Owing to the hard works of our skilled professionals, we have been able to establish ourselves as the leading manufacturer, exporter and supplier of high quality products. These products are well-known for their features like perfect finish, sturdy construction and low maintenance.
